text: Hi, does anyone know how to pass customBehavoral events properties as url instead of string? I can't create a url type field and those are the only that have more then 256 char. I am using segment to pass those events.:thread:
If I use a string field I get the error CustomBehavioralEventPropertyError.TOO_LONG_NON_URL_OR_REFERRER_PROPERTY_VALUE
Does anyone know how to send data to those particular fields? Do they have a specific name?
